title: Blanche de Chambly
flv:
Wheat and subtle spices blanketed in citrus flavors
reminiscent of orange and lemon

title: Lazy Mutt Strong Ale
flv:
Aromas are of a strong pine and citrus hop.
The pine and citrus flavors both come through
with taste that nearly conceals the malt, but not quite.

title: Doc Tegart's ESB
flv:
Floral and tropical notes include passionfruit and pineapple.
It won 1st place at the East Kootenay Beer Fest in 2014.

title: Fowl Mouth ESB
flv:
Big Rock's Brewmaster’s ESB is a beautiful amber colour,
and quite balanced in the perceived hop bitterness/malt sweetness.

title: Lightning in a Bottle
flv:
Creators of Lightning in a Bottle Music+Lifestyle Festival,
in a deliciously tart Berliner Weiss with massive dry-hopping.

title: Cariboo Light Lager
flv:
This Light Lager is a low alcohol replica of Cariboo’s Award Winning Genuine Draft, without compromising
that same satisfying finish.

title: Aguila Light
flv: The lower levels of alcohol and bitterness in this lager make it light and easy to drink.

title: Corona Premier
flv:
Corona Premier is a 90 calorie, low carb extension of the well known CORONA EXTRA brand of beer. It is a light,
crisp and refreshing beer that pairs well with seafood.

title: PrimeTime
flv:
PrimeTime doesn’t compromise on ingredients,
acquiring its refreshingly fruit flavour from juicy Citra and
El Dorado hops

title: Bright Tangerine Sparkling Ale
flv:
This brew is low calorie, gluten removed, with a dry
and bubbly finish. The kicker is we load it up with heaps of natural tangerine flavor, making it a little brighter than your average ale!
